title: MAK 2T

Easily mixes with fuel

spec: Excellent flow ability ensures quick start, better pickup and makes engine run smoother

title: MAK 4T ScooTech NXT

Quick engine response and increased power output

title: MAK Super Kool
desc: Environment friendly synthetic, long life, antifreeze coolant suitable for use in liquid-cooled IC engines
spec: Prevents coolant freeze-up and boil-over
Ensures effective cooling even with 700 ppm hard water as it does not form any deposits
Protects radiator and engine block from rust and corrosion

title: MAK Evolve Synth 0W-20

spec: Better fuel economy as lower viscometry provides same power output with less fuel
Lower engine oil consumption as the synthetic oil molecules minimize evapuration loss
Offers enhanced protection to emission system components in passenger cars
